channel.title: Airvantage export data
channel.description:
Is it possible to export all the communication packets received from the MangoH Red shown in the timeline using the RedCloud application as a CSV file?
I have tried the export data functionality but that only provides system status data and not the communication packets.
Thanks

item.title: Airvantage export data
item.dc:creator: acek
item.description:
Hey @jyijyi, thanks for your reply. There are only two options available on the dashboard for data. This export does not include the LWM2M communication data that is shown in the timeline, only the system data,. Where exactly is the timeline export function?

Read full topic

item.title: Airvantage export data
item.dc:creator: jyijyi
item.description:
seems there is button for such purpose.

Read full topic
